name: Gnims
description:
What's this?

A short game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #159.

What's the goal?

Collect as many white gems as possible

Each time you collect the gem, you multiply yourself - and you have to control all of you at the same time.

Don't touch the bats or the fire for they will kill you - or at least one instance of you ;)

How to play?

Move with WASD. You can double-jump!

What else?

Enjoy I guess?
